title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-3.19 - Riveted patches
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-3.19 - Riveted patches

State Regulations
(a) General. When riveted patches are used, they shall be designed and applied
using methods acceptable to the department. (b) Materials for riveted repair. Patch
material shall meet the applicable requirements of section
14-3.12
of this Subpart. (c) Report of riveted repair. Anyone making a
riveted repair shall furnish the department and the owner of the equipment with
a report of the repair as specified in sections 14-3.2 and
14-3.3
of this Subpart, after
completion of a riveted repair. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-3.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
